page.title: 09BUILDINGS
page.content: In {BRAMLEY}there is a {GRANARY}which is on stoneslike toadstools called { {SADDLESTONES}It belongs to Stocks Farm It is{weather boarded}with a{ {half-hipped old tiled}roof.It is called The Granary. Bramley has lots of buildings,some of them are very old and are in the { {CONSERVATION AREAS.GRAYS HOUSE}is the old rectory in Bramley.It is right next to the church and has a gate way into the graveyard.It is a {TUDOR} house with colour washed brick.It also has an old tile roof.In its' huge grounds there are tennis courts and a swimming-pool.This house is inside the conservation, areas that are partly on our survey,which means it can not be altered in a major way or pulled down to make way for anything else.
